item.title: Canoe Club Summer Tour travels to 3 countries
item.author: Reece Blunt,
item.description: The faffless foursome (Alby, Tom, Reece and Patrick S.) had arrived in Bovec at 2PM and had already proceeded to buy beers and paddling permits, paddle a grade 3 river, and make a start on the first and certainly not last conspicuous looking meal, just in time for the minibus to arrive later that â€¦
